description:
It`s Sunpick`s 40th anniversary and the new hire competition is about to kick off. The prize is a vacation to Okinawa for the winner`s department. Shinozaki is aiming to win, but Dev Group 1`s chief, Akina`s old rival, has other plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even If We`re Just Playing, He`s My Kohai...
Gokko to wa Ie, Kouhai-san to...
Même si ce n’est qu’un jeu, faire ça avec mon subordonné…
ごっことはいえ, 後輩さんと...
